curiosity-room.name: Curiosity
curiosity-room.description:
An ancient artifact imbued with 
the essence of the world's mysteries. 
Once held, it awakens a thirst 
for exploration and discovery.

acceptance-room.name: Acceptance
acceptance-room.description:
A magical amulet known to 
melt the hardest of hearts. 
Upon touch, it fosters understanding 
and acceptance, even towards the most 
foreign concepts.

knowledge-room.name: Knowledge
knowledge-room.description:
A mysterious book bound in 
celestial leather. It holds the 
knowledge of the cosmos, granting 
the reader an exceptional insight 
into the unknown.

communication-room.name: Communication
communication-room.description:
An enigmatic relic from a 
long-forgotten civilization. It is said 
to enhance one's ability to communicate, 
bridging gaps between different minds.

love-room.name: Love
love-room.description:
A radiant gem pulsating with 
a warm light. When in possession, 
it kindles the purest form of 
love, bringing peace and harmony.

puzzle-room.name: There is no item here either!
